SecurityIssue.Description: Do not create a universal character name through concatenation.
SecurityIssue.Recommendation: Avoid using concatenation to form universal character names. Use direct encoding methods instead.

SecurityIssue.Description: Avoid side effects in arguments to unsafe macros.
SecurityIssue.Recommendation: Use safer alternatives to macros or ensure arguments do not produce side effects.

SecurityIssue.Description: Do not use preprocessor directives in invocations of function-like macros.
SecurityIssue.Recommendation: Ensure that preprocessor directives are not used in the arguments of function-like macros to prevent unexpected behavior.
